meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Walsh Kevin Foley Ami Li Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7663.

td.p: Sarah Walsh, a children’s librarian from Rockville, Maryland
Kevin Foley, a police captain from Mount Sinai, New York
Ami Li, a freelance writer from Lyme, Connecticut (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,200)

tr.td: KILLING GARY OLDMAN
RHYME TIME FASHION
HISTORIC DATES
I GOT 3 I'S ON YOU
HODGEPODGE
IF THE BEES WENT AWAY...
